titles.title: FOR VETS Act of 2012
Formerly Owned Resources for Veterans to Express Thanks for Service Act of 2012
FOR VETS Act of 2012
Formerly Owned Resources for Veterans to Express Thanks for Service Act of 2012
A bill to amend title 40, United States Code, to improve veterans service organizations access to Federal surplus personal property.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 12/19/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Formerly Owned Resources for Veterans to Express Thanks for Service Act of 2012 or FOR VETS Act of 2012 - Authorizes the transfer of federal surplus property to a state agency for distribution through donation within the state for purposes of education or public health for organizations whose membership comprises substantially veterans and whose representatives are recognized by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) in the preparation, presentation, and prosecution of claims under laws administered by the Secretary.
